basic.description: This course provides an introduction to probabilistic models and methods for addressing uncertainty and variability in engineering applications. Topics include sample spaces and events, axioms of probability, conditional probability, independence, discrete and continuous random variables, probability density and cumulative distribution functions, functions of random variables, and random processes.
basic.subject: ELEC
basic.title: Probability & Random Processes

extra.enrollment_requirement: Exclusion: STAT251.  Prerequisite of APSC171 and registered in a BSCE Academic Program.
